name: Justine Norie
description: Web React Developer & Multi-Platform App Builder, Hands-on problem solver specializing in modern web, mobile, and desktop systems with strong UI/UX, real-world project development, and end-to-end architecture skills.
bio: I am a dedicated software engineer with a focus on system architecture and design. I thrive on building scalable, efficient, and robust systems that solve real-world problems. My approach involves deep analysis of requirements, careful selection of technologies, and a commitment to best practices in coding and deployment. Whether it's a complex web platform or a high-performance backend service, I aim for architectural excellence.
block1: I am a Developer who designs software architectures, builds dependable and user-focused for web applications

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology

projects.name: E-commerce Dashboard
projects.description: A comprehensive dashboard for managing online stores, featuring real-time analytics and inventory management.

experience.description: Built responsive websites for various clients. Gained proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
